# videoComposition

**Instance Property**

A video composition to use when extracting images from assets with multiple video tracks.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var videoComposition: AVVideoComposition? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you don’t specify a video composition, the generator only uses the first enabled video track.

If specify a video composition, the image generator ignores the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetImageGenerator/appliesPreferredTrackTransform] property.

Setting a video composition with any of the following attributes generates an exception:

- A [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/renderScale] not equal to `1.0`.
- A [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/renderSize] with a width or height less than `0`.
- A [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/frameDuration] that’s invalid, or less than or equal to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/zero].
- A [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/sourceTrackIDForFrameTiming] less than [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/zero].

## Configuring compositing

- **customVideoCompositor**: A custom video compositor to use when extracting images from assets with multiple video tracks.
